title: Post Season Schedule Config
custom_preconds:
This config is used to provide some information about each series in the postseason

https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/ANDROID-4296

prod:  http://mlb.mlb.com/mobile/postseason/postSeasonScheduleConfig.xml
qa:  http://qa.mlb.com/mobile/postseason/postSeasonScheduleConfig.xml

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the config file
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following information will be provided:
- Default series id
- Default game id

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Default series id
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then it shall point to a specific series to be open first. 

* Not sure if this is needed with new design

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Default game id for a Tablet
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then it shall point to a specific game to be opened in gameday. 

NOTE: Used for tablets

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views each series here
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following content appears:
- Away Team/Home Team id
- Game type
- Position
- Header override lines

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Away Team/Home Team id
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then it shall display teams that are playing in that series. There are additional team id's that are reserved for dual logos. These would show up when a team is still being determined.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Game type
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then this will indicate:
- Wild card, 
- Division, 
- LCS,
- World Series

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Positions
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then this will indicate the order of tabs

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Header override lines
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then this will indicate the text to display for a series in the header. If empty then the app will supply it's own text based on game info.

title: Summary Screen
custom_preconds:
Summary screen is new for 2015. The PostSeasonSyncService can be used to to get game information.

https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/ANDROID-4297

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the PostSeasonSyncService
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then it will attempt to aggregate all of these data sources so it's easier to get game information.  It will also perform the following:
- schedule lookups, 
- scoreboards requests,
- requests for the schedule configs

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Tie Breakers
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then this will appear in the same tab as the wild card series
